item.title: RIL, Kalyan Jewellers, MMTC, Spandana Sphoorty, Paytm, Dixon Technologies, KEC International: Check top buzzing stocks of the day - Upstox
item.description:
Top Buzzing Stocks of the Day: RIL, Kalyan Jewellers, and More

Date: January 8, 2025 | Source: Upstox

Domestic shares were generally in negative territory in the afternoon deals, with significant movement among various stocks.

  • Kalyan Jewellers: Shares dropped 7.5% despite a 39% revenue growth in Q3.
  • Reliance Industries (RIL): The stock rose nearly 2% with analysts predicting up to 36% upside.
  • Dixon Technologies: Stock fell 7.8% but remains up 171% over the past year.
  • Zomato: Shares declined 2.73% amid competition concerns.
  • Ola Electric Mobility: Stock dropped over 5% after receiving a SEBI warning.
  • Tata Technologies: Shares rose 3.4% after a new partnership announcement.
  • Dr Reddy's: Stock climbed 3.99% following a subsidiary's sale announcement.
  • ONGC: Shares up over 2% as crude oil prices rise.
  • MMTC: Stock trading over 12% higher.
  • Spandana Sphoorty: Stock rose over 14%, showcasing positive performance in microfinance.
  • Paytm: Shares dropped 5.75% following the sale of a stake in PayPay Corporation.
  • KEC International: Stock was down 6.81% post-initial gains from securing new orders.

item.title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025 Announced: Check Expected Deals On Smartphones, Exchange Offers, And Bank Discounts - Zee News
item.description:
Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025 Announced: Check Expected Deals On Smartphones, Exchange Offers, And Bank Discounts

Date: January 13, 2025 - Source: Zee News

The Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025 is set to begin on January 13 at 12 PM, offering shoppers exciting discounts and exchange offers on a wide range of products.

Key Points:

  • The sale kicks off with early access at midnight on January 13.
  • Exchange offers include up to Rs 45,000 off on smartphones and discounts on other electronics.
  • Bank offers include a 10% discount for SBI Credit Card users and 5% cashback for ICICI Amazon Pay Credit Card users.
  • Major smartphone brands like OnePlus, Motorola, and Samsung are expected to feature heavily in the sale.
"Consumers can avail of exchange discounts of up to Rs 45,000 on smartphones, Rs 7,000 on laptops, and Rs 15,000 on home appliances."

In conclusion, the Amazon Great Republic Day Sale promises significant savings for consumers looking to upgrade their gadgets and enjoy various deals.

item.title: Sam Altman reacts to his sister’s allegations of financial, sexual abuse; “untrue”, says OpenAI CEO - The Hindu
item.description:
Sam Altman reacts to his sister’s allegations of financial, sexual abuse; “untrue”, says OpenAI CEO

Published: January 08, 2025 12:37 pm IST

Source: The Hindu

OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has denied allegations of sexual abuse made by his sister, labeling them as “untrue” and attributing her claims to mental health challenges.

  • Altman responded to a lawsuit filed by his sister alleging sexual abuse that began when she was three years old.
  • He emphasized the emotional toll on their family due to these allegations.
  • Altman claimed that the family has financially and medically supported his sister, who has publicly accused them multiple times before.
  • Amidst these claims, he mentioned that she has made various accusations against family members regarding money and privacy issues.
“All of these claims are utterly untrue,” said Altman. “This situation causes immense pain to our entire family.”

Altman reiterated that the accusations had evolved over time, intensifying with the recent lawsuit filed against him.

item.title: Top Cement Stock Picks: These shares offer upside of up to 30%, as per CLSA - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Top Cement Stock Picks: These shares offer upside of up to 30%, as per CLSA

Publication Date: January 8, 2025
Source: CNBC TV18

Brokerage firm CLSA has turned constructive on the cement sector as earnings visibility improves and opportunities arise for companies.

  • CLSA forecasts a demand recovery in the cement sector.
  • Consolidation and capacity expansion are expected to continue.
  • Profitability is aided by low base and cost savings.
  • Significant upgrades and price target changes for leading cement stocks.
“CLSA has upgraded ACC and Dalmia Bharat to 'outperform'. Ambuja Cements holds a potential upside of 19%.”

This renewed optimism in the cement sector suggests a positive outlook for investors, with potential upsides in multiple stocks.

item.title: Zomato enters 15 minutes delivery battle, app shows new tab for customers | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Zomato Launches 15-Minute Delivery Option in App

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Live Mint

Zomato has introduced a new '15 minutes delivery' option in its app, allowing customers to see food options that can be delivered quickly from restaurants within a 1.5 km radius of their location, further intensifying the competition in quick delivery services.

  • Zomato's app now features a '15 mins delivery' tab in the Explore section.
  • The delivery option is currently limited to restaurants within a 1.5 km distance.
  • This move follows Swiggy's launch of a 10-minute delivery service called 'Bolt'.
  • Zomato's previous attempt at a quick delivery service, Zomato Instant, came amid customer backlash in 2022.
“Will be for specific nearby locations, popular and standardised items only.” - Deepinder Goyal, CEO of Zomato

The launch of Zomato's 15-minute delivery service indicates a competitive thrust into the quick delivery segment, possibly leading to a revised approach to their earlier quick-service initiatives.

item.title: Here is why Reliance Industries share price has a potential upside of 36% - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Here is why Reliance Industries share price has a potential upside of 36%

Publication Date: January 8, 2024 | Source: CNBCTV18

Brokerage firm Jefferies has reviewed Reliance Industries Ltd’s share price and indicates a potential upside of 36%, reiterating its 'buy' recommendation.

  • Jefferies sets a price target of ₹1,690, indicating a 36% upside from Tuesday's closing price.
  • Reliance Industries recently underperformed the Nifty 50 index by 15% in 2024.
  • Concerns over growth prospects in the retail sector and lower earnings growth impacted share performance.
  • Growth restoration in the retail business and profit improvements in the Oil-To-Chemicals sector are expected by FY2026.
  • Reliance's current valuations are the cheapest since March 2020.
  • Bernstein also projects a recovery cycle in 2025, targeting ₹1,520 per share for Reliance Industries.
  • Out of 39 analysts, 33 recommend 'buy', with the highest target being ₹1,950.
“Risk-reward for the stock is attractive as valuations are at a three-year low.” - Bernstein

The overall market sentiment indicates optimism for Reliance Industries as it trades at ₹1,263, showing a modest gain.

item.title: SEBI ‘warning’ letter on social media to Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal: You have failed to … - The Times of India
item.description:
SEBI Cautions Ola CEO Bhavish Aggarwal Over Social Media Conduct

Publication Date: October 23, 2023 | Source: Economic Times

In a recent communication, the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has issued a warning letter to Ola's CEO, Bhavish Aggarwal, citing concerns over his activities on social media which may be in violation of securities laws.

  • The warning highlights specific posts made by Aggarwal that could mislead investors.
  • SEBI emphasizes the importance of transparency and ethical conduct in financial communications.
  • This comes amid increased scrutiny of leaders in the tech industry regarding their public statements.
"We expect all market participants to adhere strictly to disclosure norms and avoid any statements that could mislead stakeholders," stated a SEBI official.

This warning serves as a reminder of the regulatory obligations that CEOs have towards their public communications, especially in volatile markets.

item.title: Ola Electric shares in focus after SEBI warns of disclosure norm violations - The Economic Times
item.description:
Ola Electric Shares Drop 4% After Sebi Warning Over Disclosure Violations

Publication Date: January 8, 2024 Source: Economic Times

Ola Electric Mobility shares fell 3.8% after SEBI issued a warning for violating disclosure norms regarding the early announcement of a planned store network expansion. The Karnataka High Court also granted Ola an extension to respond to the CCPA.

  • Ola Electric shares dropped to Rs 76.12 on January 8, following an administrative warning from SEBI.
  • SEBI cited violations related to early announcements made by the company’s Chairman.
  • Ola Electric clarified that there are no financial implications from this warning.
  • The Karnataka High Court granted a six-week extension for Ola to respond to the CCPA's notice.
  • The average target price for Ola Electric shares is Rs 97, suggesting a potential upside of 22%.
"You are hereby warned and advised to be careful in the future and to improve your compliance standards." - SEBI

The incident highlights the importance of compliance with disclosure norms in the industry, and it remains to be seen how Ola Electric will navigate these challenges moving forward.

item.title: Tata Steel reports 6% YoY rise in crude steel production during Q3 FY25; check details, and how shares are performing - Upstox
item.description:
Tata Steel Reports 6% Yearly Growth in Crude Steel Production in Q3 FY25

Date: January 8, 2023 Source: PTI

Tata Steel has announced a year-on-year rise of 6% in crude steel production, reaching 5.68 million tonnes in Q3 FY25.

  1. Crude steel production increased from 5.35 million tonnes in Q3 FY24.
  2. Quarter-on-quarter, production saw an 8% increase.
  3. Steel deliveries in India rose by 8.4% year-on-year to 5.29 million tonnes.
  4. Tata Steel Netherlands reported liquid steel production of 1.76 million tonnes.
  5. UK operations saw a significant drop with output at zero due to blast furnace closures.
  6. CEO TV Narendran discussed challenges including China's pricing and global recovery issues.
“Despite challenges, Tata Steel is well-positioned and profitable in India due to growing demand.” - TV Narendran

The rise in production and deliveries indicates Tata Steel's robust position in the market despite global challenges.

item.title: TCS Dividend: BIG announcement in Q3 FY2025 results; record date FIXED - ET Now
item.description:
TCS Dividend Announcement: Record Date Fixed for Q3 FY2025

Updated: January 8, 2025, 08:28 IST

Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is set to announce a dividend for its shareholders in its Q3 results for FY2025, and has fixed January 17 as the record date for eligibility.

  • TCS's board will meet on January 9 to approve Q3 results and consider declaring the interim dividend.
  • This would be TCS's third interim dividend in the current financial year.
  • The record date for determining shareholder eligibility for dividend payment is January 17, 2025.
"The third interim dividend, if declared, shall be paid to the equity shareholders of the Company whose names appear on the Register of Members of the Company or in the records of the Depositories as beneficial owners of the shares as on the Record Date fixed for the purpose."

TCS has a history of high dividend payments, having paid significant dividends over recent years. Investors are advised to consult financial advisors for investment decisions.

item.title: Sam Altman reacts to sexual abuse allegations by his sister. Mom and brother call claims ‘utterly untrue’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sam Altman Denies Sexual Abuse Allegations Made by Sister

Publication Date: Jan 08, 2025   |   Source: Hindustan Times

OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and his family have publicly denied allegations of sexual abuse made by his sister, Ann Altman, in a lawsuit filed against him. The family expressed concern for Ann's well-being in their statement.

  • Ann Altman alleges that Sam sexually abused her from 1997 to 2006.
  • The family attempts to support Ann financially and medically while asserting the claims are false.
  • The family's statement describes Ann's allegations as 'utterly untrue' and highlights their ongoing attempts to assist her.
  • Ann has reportedly made various allegations against family members over the years, complicating the situation.
“This situation causes immense pain to our entire family.”

The family is distressed by the legal actions and the claims made against them, asserting they wish to help but are met with resistance from Ann.

item.title: Stocks to watch, January 8: Berger Paints, Jindal Worldwide, Ola Electric, M&M, Tata Steel, CESC, and more - Upstox
item.description:
Stocks to watch, January 8: Berger Paints, Jindal Worldwide, Ola Electric, M&M, Tata Steel, CESC, and more

Date & Source: January 8, 2025

The domestic equity market is anticipated to open slightly lower on January 8, with global markets showing mixed trends.

  • Jindal Worldwide has announced a 4:1 bonus share issuance.
  • Berger Paints clarifies its position regarding the potential acquisition of Akzo Nobel's stake in India.
  • Dr Reddy's is selling its Louisiana subsidiary as part of a restructuring effort.
  • CESC has received approval for a new hybrid power project.
  • Tata Steel reports a 6% increase in Q3 crude steel production.
  • M&M announces pricing for its new electric SUVs.
  • Ola Electric received a warning from SEBI regarding information dissemination violations.
  • Sobha reports a 17.8% increase in sales value for Q3-FY25.
  • Rail Vikas Nigam Limited signs an MoU for infrastructure projects in the GCC.
  • Signatureglobal sees over double the bookings compared to last year.
  • Tata Technologies partners with Telechips for automotive innovations.
  • SBI appoints a new deputy managing director.
  • Puravankara appoints a new CFO with extensive experience.
  • NTPC establishes a subsidiary for nuclear energy projects.
  • Birlasoft's CEO resigns effective February 7.
  • Maruti Suzuki unveils its vision for electric mobility, ‘e For Me.’

(With inputs from Reuters)

item.title: Remember Zuckerberg admiring Anant Ambani’s watch? His ₹7.7 crore timepiece explodes internet - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mark Zuckerberg's ₹7.7 Crore Watch Sparks Social Media Frenzy

Date: Jan 08, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Mark Zuckerberg made headlines after he was seen wearing a luxurious watch valued at approximately ₹7.7 crore during a Facebook video announcement about a policy overhaul at Meta.

  • Zuckerberg's watch, a Greubel Forsey ‘Hand Made 1’, is extremely rare, with only two or three made each year.
  • His video announcement included the controversial decision to eliminate third-party fact-checkers from Meta's platforms.
  • The watch's cost sparked social media discussions, with many commenting on its value exceeding that of a typical house.
  • Notable reactions on social media included comments on the cultural disconnect of wearing such an expensive item while discussing community issues.
“Zuck was wearing a ~$1M watch in his community notes announcement video. Nothing says I understand the culture shift of the community more than a watch that costs more than most people's houses.”

This incident highlights the attention and discussions surrounding celebrity choices and their disconnect with everyday experiences.

item.title: Stocks to buy for short term: IREDA, Apollo Hospitals among 6 stocks that may rise 7-16% in 2-3 weeks, say analysts | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Stocks to buy for short term: IREDA, Apollo Hospitals among 6 stocks that may rise 7-16% in 2-3 weeks, say analysts

Date: January 7

Source: Live Mint

Despite ongoing market volatility, analysts suggest investing in six particular stocks that may see gains in the coming weeks. These include IREDA and Apollo Hospitals, with expected upside potential ranging from 7% to 16%.

  • Indian stock market is experiencing mild gains in January.
  • Market uncertainty driven by foreign capital outflows and interest rate speculation.
  • Experts recommend six stocks to buy, including IREDA, Affle, and Apollo Hospitals.
  • Analysts forecast price growth ranging from 7% to 16% within 2-3 weeks.
"If the stock sustains above ₹7,550, it could move towards upside targets of ₹8,000-8,100." - Hardik Matalia

Investors are advised to be cautious and consider market conditions before making decisions.

item.title: BYD Sealion 7 to debut at Bharat Mobility Global Expo, launch in March 2025 - Business Standard
item.description:
BYD Sealion 7 to debut at Bharat Mobility Global Expo, launch in March 2025

Published on Jan 08 2025 | Source: Business Standard

The BYD Sealion 7 is all set to make its debut at the upcoming Bharat Mobility Global Expo in March 2025. This affordable coupe SUV, inspired by the BY Seal, features advanced technology and impressive design.

  • Unveiled last year in China, it serves as an alternative to the Tesla Model Y.
  • It includes a 360-degree camera system for enhanced safety.
  • The SUV offers two battery options with a maximum range of up to 502 km.
  • Expected to compete with EVs like Kia EV6 and Hyundai Ioniq 5 in India.
“The Sealion 7 is built on BYD’s e-Platform 3.0 Evo and features the brand’s Blade battery technology.”

This new model is anticipated to attract significant attention at the expo and in the Indian market upon its official launch.

item.title: Stock Market LIVE: Sensex down 550 pts at 77,600; Nifty at 23,550; Broader mkts, sector indices fall - Business Standard
item.description:
Stock Market Update: Sensex Falls 550 Points Amid Global Weakness

Date: January 8, 2025 | Source: Business Standard

The Indian stock market experienced significant declines on Wednesday, largely attributed to weak performances in the US markets overnight.

  • At noon, the BSE Sensex dropped by 532.21 points to 77,666.90.
  • Nifty50 fell by 158.30 points, reaching 23,549.60.
  • Only five constituents of the BSE Sensex were up, led by Reliance Industries.
  • Broader markets also saw declines, with Nifty Midcap 100 and Nifty Smallcap 100 down by 1.77% and 1.79%, respectively.
  • All sectoral indices recorded a drop, with Consumer Durables being the hardest hit, down by 3.50%.
“The Indian economy is estimated to slow to a four-year low of 6.4% in FY25, falling short of RBI’s projection.”

In conclusion, the ongoing market trends reflect cautious investor sentiment amidst a backdrop of anticipated earnings reports and economic forecasts.

item.title: Stock Market LIVE: Sensex down 500 pts at 77,700; Broader mkts, cons dur, IT, financials drag most - Business Standard
item.description:
Stock Market LIVE: Sensex down 500 pts at 77,700; Broader mkts, cons dur, IT, financials drag most

Date: January 08, 2025 Source: Business Standard

On January 8, 2025, Indian markets saw a significant decline as benchmark indices felt the impact of weakened US markets and rising treasury yields.

  • The BSE Sensex dropped 496.34 points, landing at 77,702.77, while the Nifty50 fell 134.15 points to 23,573.75.
  • Foreign Institutional Investors net sold Indian equities worth Rs 1,491.46 crore.
  • Domestic Institutional Investors net bought shares worth Rs 1,615.28 crore on January 7, 2025.
  • GDP growth in India is forecasted to slow to 6.4% in FY25, below the RBI's projection.
  • Infrastructure investment growth is expected to moderate due to declining government capital expenditure.
  • 19 listed banks' net profit for Q3FY25 is estimated to grow at 9.7% Y-o-Y.
  • Top IT firms expect revenue growth between 0.1% and 7% for Q3FY25.
"With growth in the Indian economy estimated to slow to a four-year low of 6.4 per cent in FY25, sentiment might be affected."

The market is under pressure due to external and internal economic factors, yet some firms predict overall moderate returns in the equity market.

item.title: SEBI warns Ola Electric over disclosures via social media ahead of exchange filings, seeks corrective action | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
SEBI Issues Warning to Ola Electric Over Premature Social Media Disclosures

Date: January 8, 2025 | Source: Live Mint

Markets regulator SEBI has warned Ola Electric regarding violation of disclosure regulations due to a social media announcement made before official exchange filings.

  • SEBI warned Ola Electric for announcing corporate plans on social media before filing with stock exchanges.
  • Chairman Bhavish Aggarwal disclosed plans for expansion on social media hours before notifying stock exchanges.
  • The warning, issued on January 7, 2025, cites violations of SEBI regulations regarding equal access to information for investors.
  • Ola Electric has been advised to improve compliance standards and take corrective actions.
“By failing to first disseminate the information on the stock exchanges, you have failed to provide equal and timely access to information for all investors.” - SEBI Warning Letter

The warning emphasizes the need for compliance with regulations to avoid future enforcement actions from SEBI.
